name: 張詠翔
objective:
本堂課會探討幾個語言學子領域以及跨語言學、行為科學和社會科學之基礎課題：語言習得、社會語言學、心理語言學、計算機語言學等。學生將學習以實驗性的方法搜集資料、來探討他們選擇的語言現象。
本堂課理論實務介紹會穿插著學生實體或線上實驗、練習操作。

This course will explore a variety of disciplines within linguistics as well as some cross-interdisciplinary linguistic domains. Students will learn to use experimental methods to collect data to investigate the language phenomenon of their choice. Class lectures will be intertwined with hands-on experiments (online or offline) and activities during the 3-hour meeting.
